item.title: SAWD - the fun version
item.description: Disclaimer: I am writing this post while recovering from 3-day covid-y fever. So, there is a chance that memes to technical details ratio is alarmingly high. If you want the boring technical stuff, read the paper :^) This post is about dvcon paper titled SAWD: Systemverilog Assertions waveform based development tool which was a weekend project that escalated quickly. Problem statement Link to heading Starting with problem statement, I will just use this xkcd joke that I am big fan of :)
